To Winnipeg a 9-28-44.
To Athens - 2-10-45.
also 2d Secty of Emb
Apptd. Consul 7-16-44; assigned Consul,
Munich, Germany 10-15-46. To Berlin as FSO 8-12-46
also 3rd Sec'y.

also 3rd Sec'y. 12-23-45.
To Santiago as V. Consul 12-22-47
Also 2d Sec'y-Apptd Consul 5-15-47c; Assigned
Consul, Habana 5-15-47.
Also 3rd Secy. - Designated 2d Secty 7-16-47.
F.S.O. Assigned to dept. Dec. 5, 1949
